name: XenServer License File
summary: Learn about .XSLIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XSLIC files are typically downloaded through a Citrix Web interface after receiving a "Citrix Licence Delivery" email when the product was purchased. You can install your XenServer license key in XenCenter by highlighting a XenServer instance, choosing Server â†’ Install License Key..., and then choosing your XSLIC file.

description: Software license file used by XenClient, an administration application for XenServer virtualization software; contains a key that registers the XenServer software; includes the expiry date, product code, number of licensed sockets, and other product information.
